forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and becoming windy. Low -4C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and becoming windy. Low around 25F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow along with gusty winds at times, especially during the morning. High -2C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow along with gusty winds at times, especially during the morning. High 27F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening turning to all snow overnight. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to snow showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
